structural_units.address:
Ravila 14a
50411 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: The mineral genesis in igneous, metamorphic and sedimentary-diagenetic processes will be studied, and the introduction to mineral investigation methods will be given.
description.et: Aines tutvustatakse mineraalide teket magamalistes, moonde- ja sette-diageneesi protsessides ning õpitakse tundma peamisi mineraalide uurimismeetodeid.

objectives.en: Genetic mineralogy and investigation methods in mineralogy.
objectives.et: Aine käsitleb geneetilise mineraloogia küsimusi ning tutvustab mineraalide uurimismeetodeid.

learning_outcomes.en: To learn the main mineral investigation methods.
